name: Opening Ceremony & Welcome Toast
description: Join us for the official start of the festival with a welcome from the organizers and a celebratory toast.

name: Folk Music Concert by 'Bodajki Visszhang'
description: Enjoy an evening of traditional Hungarian folk music with the beloved local band, 'Bodajki Visszhang'.

name: DJ Set: Summer Night Grooves
description: Dance the night away by the lake with a mix of summer hits and electronic grooves.

name: Morning Yoga by the Lake
description: Start your day with a refreshing and energizing yoga session overlooking the beautiful Bodajk Lake.

name: Local Artisan Craft Fair
description: Discover unique, handmade goods from local artists and craftspeople at our town square market.

name: Historical Talk: The Story of Bodajk
description: Learn about the rich history of our town in this engaging talk set in the museum garden.

name: Children's Story Hour
description: A fun and interactive story session for the youngest festival-goers.

name: Classical Music Recital
description: Experience a serene afternoon with a beautiful classical music performance inside Saint Stephen's Church.

name: Wine Tasting: Local Vineyards
description: Sample a selection of fine wines from the region's best local vineyards.

name: Sunset Acoustic Session
description: Relax and unwind with a live acoustic music performance as the sun sets over the lake.

name: Open Air Movie Screening
description: Enjoy a classic film under the stars in the heart of the town square.

name: Community Breakfast
description: Share a delicious breakfast with fellow festival attendees and community members.

name: Guided Tour of Saint Stephen's Church
description: Take a guided tour to explore the architecture and history of this significant local landmark.

name: Photography Workshop: Capturing Bodajk
description: Learn tips and tricks for capturing the beauty of Bodajk in this hands-on photography workshop.

name: Closing Remarks & Future Plans
description: Join us for the closing remarks of the festival and a look ahead to next year's event.
